messages.page_content:
- Topic: Amendment to Zoning Ordinance for Wineries and Micro-breweries
- Summary: The ordinance aimed to amend the Comprehensive Zoning Ordinance of the City of New Orleans to include wineries in use tables and use standards in appropriate districts. It would impact zoning districts permitting micro-breweries, micro-distilleries, breweries, and distilleries. The amendment was electronically submitted and had a deadline of 7/21/21.
- Ordinance Number: 33324
- Votes Summary:
    Vote 1: Passed - (8 YEAS, 0 NAYS, 0 ABSTAIN, 1 ABSENT)
- Decision/Key Actions: The amendment to the zoning ordinance for wineries and micro-breweries passed unanimously.
- Tags/Keywords: Zoning Ordinance, Wineries, Micro-breweries
- UID: 1a6c7dbc-365f-414a-9279-849e760ea81d

- Topic: Restructuring Minimum Annual Rent for Naval Support Activity - East Bank
- Summary: This ordinance aimed to delete and replace SECTION 2 of Ordinance No. 27,034 M.C.S. to restructure the minimum annual rent due to the City of New Orleans for the property known as the Naval Support Activity - East Bank. It was electronically submitted with a postponement deadline of 9/3/21.
- Ordinance Number: 33325
- Votes Summary:
    Vote 1: Passed - (7 YEAS, 1 NAYS, 0 ABSTAIN, 1 ABSENT)
- Decision/Key Actions: The ordinance to restructure the minimum annual rent for the Naval Support Activity - East Bank passed with a majority vote.
- Tags/Keywords: Rent Restructuring, Naval Support Activity
- UID: 1a6c7dbc-365f-414a-9279-849e760ea81d

- Topic: Amendment to Lease Agreement for Naval Support Activity - East Bank
- Summary: This ordinance aimed to authorize the Mayor of New Orleans to enter into an amendment to the Lease Agreement with EMDRC Partners, LLC for the Naval Support Activity - East Bank. The amendment would modify various terms of the lease, including development schedule, public amenities, rent, feasibility period, funding, and insurance requirements. It was electronically submitted with a postponement deadline of 9/3/21.
- Ordinance Number: 33326
- Votes Summary:
    Vote 1: Passed - (6 YEAS, 2 NAYS, 0 ABSTAIN, 1 ABSENT)
- Decision/Key Actions: The ordinance to authorize the amendment to the Lease Agreement for the Naval Support Activity - East Bank passed with a majority vote.
- Tags/Keywords: Lease Agreement, Naval Support Activity, Amendment
- UID: 1a6c7dbc-365f-414a-9279-849e760ea81d

- Summary: The ordinance authorizes the Mayor of the City of New Orleans to enter into a Cooperative Endeavor Agreement with the Jefferson Parish Sheriff’s Office for the public purpose of participating in a Criminal Intelligence Center operated by JPSO in Jefferson Parish. The ordinance was electronically submitted and met the Postponement Deadline.
